text: Does `{% dnd_area %}` work in HubSpot Blogpost template? for me when in add dnd tag it doesn't work in the blog post template. Does HubSpot has this limitation? :thinkonk:
you can't use it in blog post templates
ImageField should not allow saving if it is required and does not have an image, right?
I think leaving a required field empty just prevents from publishing/updating

Hi I believe serverless functions are disabled on non enterprise plans.

Is it possible to just host a json file somewhere in the CMS over the cdn as an alternative?

<https://climate-view-website.vercel.app/>

(this will be a react js cms building block module)

This error is happening to me with all the Fields within a RepeatedFieldGroup, I think it had already been reported before but just in case I mention it again here. I noticed that the error also happens with a LinkField
